item.title: Finding Log4j (The skiddie way)
item.description: About So the past week the internet was on fire, log4j CVE dropped and it dropped hard. It was like as if people were running for their lives, putting out fires. And it got even worse after the infosec community quickly started hunting for this vulnerability. Today letâ€™s take a dig into vulnerability and learn how to find it (The skiddie way). What is Log4j CVE-2021-44228 I guess you already know about it, if not then here are some great resources:
